1.  Swift Boat Veterans Blast Kerry. 
 
 Vietnam Vets Organization Blasts Kerry in new TV Ad.
 
 Click below for video.
 
 http://humaneventsonline.com.edgesuite.net/unfit_video_wmv.html
 
 During the DNC Convention Kerry made his Vietnam record apparently one of the issues that he will "run on". Shouldn't his Vietnam record then be scrutinized to determine if he is indeed telling the truth concerning that record?
 
 2.  The National Journal, a non-partisan, non-ideological newsweekly named John Kerry the most liberal Senator in 2003 ...quite a dubious distinction. Just Google: National Journal John Kerry Liberal and numerous sites will be there to choose from to read. Kerry may try and paint himself as a moderate/centrist, but the record shows otherwsie.
 
 Heres one link: 
 
 http://www.drudgereport.com/mattjk11.htm
 
 3. John Kerry has a website link to GLBT: Gays, Lesbians, Bisexuals, Transgenders(Cross Dressers)?
 
 BeatKerry2004.com
 
 "In a real gutsy move, Kerry has included a link to GLBT. No, it's not some mispelled sandwich, GLBT stands for Gays, Lesbians, Bisexuals and transgenders. If Kerry really supports Gays, Lesbians, Bisexuals and transgenders, why doesn't he spell it out?...
 
 Beat Kerry2004.com is hopeful that all the transgenders in America vote for Kerry. Kerry can have their votes. The vast majority of Americans just don't identify with cross-dressing, sex-changing..."
